author: ChrisMisan
body:
#### PR description:
Additional per-channel plot was added to the harvester, it allows to investigate produced calibration fit. Plot is saved together with all of the worker plots after the harvesting stage. 

#### PR validation:

wfs 1041, 1044

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR is a  backport of #39493
title: [12_4_X] Add calibration fit plot to the PPS HPTDC PCL
